Text: Thanks so much for your time and effort in making this torrent :--)

I did not go into this movie expecting a full on gore fest, and perhaps that is why I am extremely pleased with the film. It is a drama, not a horror movie. The survival of a man and his hope of reclaiming a lost world, not a shoot-em-up zombie flick.

I highly suggest this one if you are looking for a film with plot. If you are looking for a bloodbath, DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
